content.rendered:
Directed by Vignesh Shivan

Written by Vignesh Shivan

Star Vijay Sethupathi (Ranjankudi Anbarasu Murugesa Boopathy Ohondhiran / Rambo). Nayanthara (Kanmani Ganguly). Samantha Ruth Prabhu (Khatija Begum). Prabhu (Prabhu, game show host). Redin Kingsley (Arnold). Lollu Sabha Maaran (Maaran, Rambo’s friend). G. Kala (Idhayakala). S. Sreesanth (Mohammed Mobi). Dipika Kothari (Minmini Ganguly, Kanmani’s sister). Bhargav Sundar (Bhargav Ganguly, Kanmani and Minmini’s brother). Seema (Minah Kaif, Rambo’s mother). Divya Pillai (Young Minah Kaif). Kamalesh (Young Rambo). Dhilip Subbarayan (A drunk tenant). Shihan Hussaini (Karate trainer). Chitra Lakshmanan (Rambo’s fake father). Ravikanth (Khatija’s father). Ravi Raghavendra (Fake psychiatrist). Bijili Ramesh (A chocobar seller). Teju Ashwini (Khatija’s friend). Lingesan (Rambo’s father). Latha (Khatija’s mother). Saravanan (Jaga)

Language Tamil

Producers Lalit Kumar

Production Rowdy Pictures. Seven Screen Studio
